# selectors

## Selectors

## Description
List of selectors that can be used to specify variables inside steps. 

## Format
An object of class `environment` of length 0. 

## Usage
```r
cur_info_env 
```



## Section

## Selectors

- `has_type()`

- `all_numeric()`

- `all_nominal()`

- `starts_with()`

- `ends_with()`

- `one_of()`

- `matches()`

- `contains()`

- `everything()`
